DOC.brief_summary: This study aim compare clinical efficacy multimedia audiovisual training hand `` practice till perfect '' train pediatric emergency medicine resident ' procedural skill . This initial study explore success rate infant lumbar puncture child intravenous access skill post-graduate year one pediatric resident .
DOC.brief_title: Patient Outcomes Simulation Education ( POISE ) Intravenous ( IV ) Lumbar Puncture ( LP ) Multi-institution Protocol
